resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."

"Your contact journal shows you the days on which you have a low or increased risk based on the encounters evaluated by the app. This means you can warn people you have been with on these days if they do not use the Corona-Warn-App themselves. These people may have been exposed to a comparable risk. The people and places in your contact journal are not necessarily related to the indicated exposures, however."
"See an overview of the latest key figures for the infection numbers in Germany."
